data.author: Thomas La Mendola

changelog.release_notes:
- Quitted Google API (not always reliable for the schedules) and implemented a new and optimized API to provide accurate data
- Refreshed and simplified interface
- Implemented cached schedules to improve loading speed for recurring requests

- Improved settings page with pre-filling of current settings data (and other goodies)
- Guess what? Bug fixes... :P

- Added new settings! GPS Timeout, GPS Maximum Age and GPS High Accuracy
- Improved error detection and handling
- Bug fixes, as usual

- Added "error" cards: "bus stops out of range" & "buses currently not available" scenarios
- Added the possibility (in Settings) to set the radius of the "detecting zone" for closest bus stops
- Bug fixes, of course... ;)

- Improved GPS localization time
- Added alert card in case of bus stops out of range of proximity

data.description:
Unofficial app

The purpose of "MyCiTiNext" is simple.
Get the scheduled time of the next bus available based on the proximity to the closest stop, according to the Cape Town MyCiTi transport services.
It will be listed right on your wrist, showing you the time of the next available buses for all the directions.

Feel free to send comments or suggestions to improve this app.
This app is unofficial and not endorsed by MyCiTi or the City of Cape Town.

latest_release.release_notes:
- Quitted Google API (not always reliable for the schedules) and implemented a new and optimized API to provide accurate data
- Refreshed and simplified interface
- Implemented cached schedules to improve loading speed for recurring requests

data.title: MyCiTi: Next Bus
